originalText.text: This is a great school with a really caring teaching staff. At first, we were a bit anxious because of its location in the middle of nowhere-- but it turned out to be an excellent school for our kid with teachers that all really care and take time to communicate. We really appreciate them.

originalText.text: East River Child Development goes above and beyond in the way they work with the children, parents and outside service providers! As a psychologist in the DOE, I found the staff and director to be extremely helpful in the "Turning Five" process. They have a knack for working with the students they service and their parents during this complicated and sometimes stressfull process. They were also extremely helpful and accommodating to my colleague and I during the process in helping to provide timely reports and a conferencing area for our meetings. This is my second year working with ERCD and I look forward to many more years of working together with them. I've been to many preschools and ERCD stands out for the quality services they provide across the board. I would highly recommend them!

originalText.text: Absolutely love this school! My son improved so much in just a year! They care so much about the students! The best decision I made for my son!

originalText.text: My daughter started here at age 3 and stayed here for two years. It is a very simple setting with very caring staff. My daughter has grown and learn so much from here.
